title: Trade certificate in IT Development
description: I finished my apprenticeship with an assignment on the development of a PWA. The assignment lasted one week, and involved retrieving, storing and displaying API data in an interface. The solution was developed in the Quasar framework.

images.description: Tab for logging daily food consumption, with foods from the matvaretabellen.no API.
Foods and ingredients can be combined into user-defined meals.
Graph for comparison with older values.

title: Apprentice at Anteo AS
description: From 2022 to 2024 I was an apprentice at the SaaS company Anteo. There I worked on tasks related to web development, mainly with front-end aspects, but also with maintenance of existing systems. I used JavaScript, React, Vue.

images.description: Here I designed and developed a simple interface for collecting and storing boat groups for a backend.
This is a picture of a larger apprenticeship project that involved displaying boats and their missions in real time.
A simple component to prevent user errors.

title: Internship student at Apility AS
description: Through VG2 I was an intern at the web company Apility. There I was introduced to industry tools and collaboration methods like Git.

title: Personal projects
description: Through school and free time, I have explored and learned more about new technologies related to programming and coding. Developing interactive programs such as 3D games was one of the first things I became interested in.

images.description: A school project for a sustainable means of communication for the disabled.
A simple helicopter simulator developed in Godot3D.
At the request of a family member, a website for drawing sumsudoku.
